solo-digital-135.1: During your Heal ability targeting an ally, add +1 %game.action.heal% and %game.condition.strengthen%.

solo-digital-137.1: Any time you perform an attack, add %game.action.pierce% 1 to the Attack.

solo-digital-138.1: Whenever you create an obstacle, all enemies adjacent to the obstalce gain %game.condition.muddle%.

solo-digital-139.1: Any time you perform an %data.characterColored.mindthief:Augment% action, add +2 %game.action.attack% to the entire action.

solo-digital-140.1: When damaged by an attack, you may %game.element.consume.light% to gain %game.action.shield% 2 and %game.action.retaliate% 1 for the attack.

solo-digital-144.1: During your turn, %game.condition.poison% and %game.condition.curse% one enemy within %game.action.range:3%.

solo-digital-146.1: After performing any %data.characterColored.music-note:Song% action, immediately perform an %game.action.attack% 2 or %game.action.move% 2 action.

solo-digital-147.1: Any time you perform a %data.characterColored.angry-face:Doom% action, immediately afterwards you may perform "%game.action.move% 1".

solo-digital-148.1: When you give one or more allies a Medical Pack or Large Medical Pack ability card, gain one Medical Pack ability card.

solo-digital-149.1: If you move 3 or more hexes on your turn, create any element.

solo-digital-150.1: After performing a %data.characterColored.two-mini:Command% action, play one card from your hand and immediately perform the same side of the card (top or bottom) as the %data.characterColored.two-mini:Command% action.

solo-digital-135.1: 치료 행동 중, 해당 %game.action.heal% 에 +1을 하고, 해당 아군에게 %game.condition.strengthen% 적용.

solo-digital-137.1: 공격을 수행할 때마다, 해당 공격에 %game.action.pierce% 1 추가.

solo-digital-138.1: 매번 장애물을 생성하는 행동을 할 때마다, 해당 장애물에 인접한 모든 적에게 %game.condition.muddle% 상태 적용.

solo-digital-139.1: %data.characterColored.mindthief:Augment% 행동을 수행할 때마다, 해당 행동 전체에 %game.action.attack% +2 추가.

solo-digital-140.1: 공격에 의해 피해를 입게 될 때, %game.element.consume.light% 를 통해 해당 공격에 대해 %game.action.shield% 2 및 %game.action.retaliate% 1 획득 가능.

solo-digital-144.1: 차례 중, %game.action.range:3% 내에 있는 적 하나에게 %game.condition.poison% 및 %game.condition.curse% 적용.

solo-digital-147.1: 매번 %data.characterColored.angry-face:Doom% 수행한 후, 즉시 '%game.action.move% 1' 수행 가능.

solo-digital-148.1:
하나 이상의 아군에게
'의료품 꾸러미' 또는
'큰 의료품 꾸러미'를 줄 때,
착용자도 “의료품 꾸러미” 한 장을 획득 가능.

solo-digital-149.1: 차례 중 3칸 이상을 이동한 경우, 아무 원소나 1개 생성.

solo-digital-150.1: %data.characterColored.two-mini:명령% 행동 수행 후, 즉시 손에 있는 카드 1장을 즉시 플레이하고 해당 카드에서 해당 %data.characterColored.two-mini:명령%과 동일한 부분(상단 또는 하단) 행동 수행.
